name: Looting Surprises
description:
Intro
The Jam theme is "surprise" so THIS PAGE IS SPOILER FREE. If you want the full game description with spoilers and screenshots please visit the Itch page below.
https://kira42.itch.io/looting-surprises-spoilers-in-description
Game
Looting Surprises is a 2D platformer made in 48 hours for the Yogcast Game Jam 2020, with the theme surprise!
Story
"Christmas is the time of sharing! Unfortunately Santa's "Naughty List" is horribly outdated and in need of restructuring. Namely, I shouldn't be on it. The plan is simple:
Sneak into Santa's workshop and get my presents."
Controls
A and D to moveW to jumpEnter to startMouse to choose level
Credits
All assets and code created during the Jam.
Kira42 - Programming and level design
Gutagi - Art
Nodegama - Art
Ryan Steel - Music and sound effects
Game engine: GMS 1.X - our dev doesn't own GMS 2 :(
Known issues
No quit to menu button. Your score is saved as soon as you complete a level so it is fine to just close and re open the game.
